summary: This mods adds variety for the vanilla armors appearance
descriptionHtml:
This mods adds variety for the vanilla armors appearance, kinda like how the fur cuirass have multiple models.
Currently, you can only craft the armors.

There two variations for each set, for male and female, one without mail on the arms, and another with only the leggings.

Currently, only the Daedric,the Glass and the Dragonscale armors are modified, I\'m planning to add 2 or 3 new set at every big update.




----Install----

1. Extract the .zip content into your data folder located in your Skyrim folder.
2. Open the Skyrim launcher, go into data files and check \"VariedArmor.esp\"
3. Launch the game and enjoy!

----Uninstall----

1. Go to your data folder and remove \"VariedArmor.esp\"
2. Delete the following files in your Meshes folder :
 -Armor/Daedric/daedriccuirassarmless_0.nif
 -Armor/Daedric/daedriccuirassarmless_1.nif
 -Armor/Daedric/daedriccuirassarmlessF_0.nif
 -Armor/Daedric/daedriccuirassarmlessF_1.nif
 -Armor/Daedric/daedriccuirassshirtless_0.nif
 -Armor/Daedric/daedriccuirassshirtless_1.nif
 -Armor/Daedric/daedriccuirassshirtlessF_0.nif
 -Armor/Daedric/daedriccuirassshirtlessF_1.nif
 -Armor/Glass/m/cuirassarmless_0.nif
 -Armor/Glass/m/cuirassarmless_1.nif
 -Armor/Glass/m/cuirassshirtless_0.nif
 -Armor/Glass/m/cuirassshirtless_1.nif
 -Armor/Glass/f/cuirassarmless_0.nif
 -Armor/Glass/f/cuirassarmless_1.nif
 -Armor/Glass/f/cuirassshirtless_0.nif
 -Armor/Glass/f/cuirassshirtless_1.nif
 -Armor/Dragonscale/dragonscalearmlessm_0.nif
 -Armor/Dragonscale/dragonscalearmlessm_1.nif
 -Armor/Dragonscale/dragonscaleshirtlessm_0.nif
 -Armor/Dragonscale/dragonscaleshirtlessm_1.nif
 -Armor/Dragonscale/dragonscalearmlessf_0.nif
 -Armor/Dragonscale/dragonscalearmlessf_1.nif
 -Armor/Dragonscale/dragonscaleshirtlessf_0.nif
 -Armor/Dragonscale/dragonscaleshirtlessf_1.nif
author: Topvman
